comment.text: Plays a major role in tight junction-specific obliteration of the intercellular space.
Directly interacts with TJP1/ZO-1, TJP2/ZO-2 and TJP3/ZO-3 (By similarity). The phosphorylated form interacts with EPCAM (PubMed:16054130). Does not interact with CD81 (PubMed:20375010).
Co-localizes with EPCAM at the basolateral cell membrane and tight junction.

Expressed in kidney, lung and prostate. Isoform 1 seems to be predominant, except in some normal prostate samples, where isoform 2 is the major form. Down-regulated in breast cancers, including ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS), lobular carcinoma in situ (LCIS) and invasive ductal carcinoma (IDC) (at protein level), as well as in several cancer cell lines. Loss of expression correlates with histological grade, occurring predominantly in high-grade lesions.

comment.name: Atlas of Genetics and Cytogenetics in Oncology and Haematology

property.value: Expressed in mucosa of transverse colon and 165 other tissues
P:calcium-independent cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell-adhesion molecules

feature.description: Interactions with TJP1, TJP2 and TJP3
Interacts with CD81, and exhibits HCV infection susceptibility in cell culture.
Interacts with CD81, and exhibits HCV infection susceptibility in cell culture.
